channel.title: How do I demote all my staff? Not as easy as I thought
channel.description:
Hi. I seem to have at least 20 staff. Realistically... This is too much to demote by hand. Is there a way I can just demote everyone in the Character files? I'm using Vista and I tried to search for character rights = 3 (something along that) either way, I searched word for word as it is in the file of and admin and nothing seemed to pop up. Help.
Brandon.

item.title: How do I demote all my staff? Not as easy as I thought
item.dc:creator: @superxero superxero
item.description:
@superxero wrote:

Go to character files, open there file, and at the top you should see player rights = (0, 1, 2, 3)
3= creator
2= admin
1= mod
0= normal player

Just edit them all that way.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I demote all my staff? Not as easy as I thought

@_Rich wrote:

Try searching for;

character-rights = 2
